Container.Name: boobjuice
Container.Overview: A simple webapp for recording, maintaining, and viewing milk pumping volumes

Config.Name: MariaDB Database
Config.Description: The name of the database this app will use. Should already be configured within mariaDB.

Config.Name: MariaDB Username
Config.Description: The user this app will use to connect to the database. This should already be configured within mariaDB.

Config.Name: MariaDB Password
Config.Description: The password this app will use to connect to the database. This should already be configured within mariaDB for the provided username.

Config.Name: MariaDB Host IP
Config.Description: The ip of the mariaDB container.

Config.Name: MariaDB Port
Config.Description: The port that mariaDB was configured to use.
